Staffordshire a no go zone or evacuation? #stopthestink https://t.co/XwaX7PpLB3

@SianieRoo @scottdegg @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @JuliaBradbury can't go on until end of September with survey after survey, we need that place closing for good, @ClareDinnisEA if you think you are surveying your way into 2026 think again, you're personally responsible for our ill health, hope you're thinking of us 3am cos we're thinking of u
This is the CSO running into our Bathing Status designated site today yuk @YorkshireWater @EnvAgency https://t.co/iCMkycnKiy

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids It stunk over 3.5 miles away in Hanford last night, seems to be  just as bad as before the "capping" .
Isn't it odd how in the last 2 weeks 6 trucks have been turned away, may I ask how many were turned away in the previous 52 weeks? and does that figure seem right as an average?

Absolutely foul stench from our favourite landfill tonight in the Westlands. Has to be at an unsafe level. Reported - not that it will do much as the @EnvAgency sit on their hands again @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe - read about Dorket Head. 40 residents took out an injunction against company FCC Environment. Note it took 2 years till it closed down! TWO YEARS!! Can we last this long here in Staffordshire? NOOOOooooo!! üôè@DrMickSalt for your Sherlock work. @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/dGjxLZBfhN
@ldmartens1 @Warren_A_Smith @StinkStopthe @DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids We cannot last two years like this üòû

@DefraGovUK @EnvAgency Just when are you going to stop this torment in North staffordshire , 10 thats 10 permit breaches in 5 months  by @RedIndustries2 . If you get 10 breaches of your driving licence what happens  ??? yes banned !!! @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink

Why won‚Äôt @EnvAgencyMids act upon our complaints & have turned a blind eye to this disaster. Who tapped phones & was charged for doing so @RedIndustries2 Director. Env health are clearly compromised in some way? #likely @NewsNBC @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe https://t.co/DZjDo6JQld

Thank you @SarahInNUL for compiling this. @EnvAgencyMids, please can you explain what technical, legal or financial challenges are unique to Walleys Quarry Landfill that prevent you from taking the same enforcement action? We're an understanding bunch, we just want to know why. https://t.co/yBdiMmY6Ag

@BBCRadioStoke How many chances are they going to be given by @EnvAgencyMids seriously? It's breach after breach and no fines for non compliance of their permit, meanwhile we continue to suffer. Sorry EA this is not good enough.
@JuliaBradbury @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg

What?! The @EnvAgency asking if you‚Äôd like to join a support group because you‚Äôre at the end of your tether due to their inaction allowing landfill gas to continue to assault you every night?! Unbelievable ü§£#stopthestink https://t.co/SOciOJOTV0

urls.title: Dorket Head landfill site in Arnold closes over 'smell'

tweets.text: @SarahInNUL @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe It has come to my attention that the Blaydon closure was only temporary, but still, it was more robust enforcement than accepting a voluntary curtailment. Also, I suspect complaint numbers were similarly low for Dorket Head, which was closed permanently (https://t.co/LA0nxaHykq).

This wide beam barge became loose this afternoon,thanks to #Bisham Abbey sailing school who recovered and secured it at the head lay-by at Temple .We are unable to locate the details of the owner from the Name ,please share so we can locate the owner ‚Å¶@EnvAgencySE‚Å© ‚Å¶ https://t.co/FQvAKN1Hpx

@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgencyMids not fit for purpose

Why do you lie @ClareDinnisEA &say you‚Äôre doing everything to u can when you have not financially penalised them or revoked their permit despite 5 new permit breaches released today? #stopthestink @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @JuliaBradbury https://t.co/QKk7QinZsi

tweets.text: This is mental torture for our children @PHE_uk @PublicHealthEng @StaffsSCB @EnvAgencyMids @pow_rebecca @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @MarcusRashford @KensingtonRoyal #childprotection #mentalhealth @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink @robbiewilliams https://t.co/itE62GCe5Y

@EnvAgencyMids You suspended Clayton Hall Landfill‚Äôs permit when they had similar problems,which focused the operators efforts to fixing the odour issues.Why can‚Äôt this be done at Walley‚Äôs?The councillor said that was the single biggest action that made a difference #stopthestink

@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids So, you are very sorry we‚Äôre still suffering? That‚Äôs ok then! üò° If you were doing ‚Äòeverything in your power‚Äô then you‚Äôd fine @RedIndustries2 and get someone in who knows how to manage a waste site without all these permit breeches. How many more chances? https://t.co/NTlu7PVxru

@SianieRoo @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @JuliaBradbury How many breaches does it take clare? You said the 30th April Nothing bloody happened, oh sorry it did, The stench got worse and travelled further, more Gassing of people, now the 1st June , you need to resign and let someone else stop this Stench & let people BREATHE FRESH AIR

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Don't worry the EA are on the case üòâ  they turning up putting sheet down they got from B&Q and think it's worked.  This stink is a major disaster and I urge all leaders to lead and not hide behind the bull the EA say.  The people of newcastle will back you.  Stop this stink
@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Horrendous last night, still around now, no sleep, gassed form 3 yesterday, still ongoing, shut the place down #stopthestink

urls.title: Low-carbon concrete flood defences to help Environment Agency hit net zero by 2030
urls.description: New roadmap sets out how EA will reduce emissions by 45% to hit 2030 net zero target

tweets.text:
We've launched a new roadmap to hit our net zero target by 2030 by reducing our carbon emissions by 45% üåç

Read our plan: https://t.co/AfenQc0C4u

#TogetherForOurPlanet #NetZero https://t.co/pE7ql2Paxe

@JuliaBradbury @scottdegg @davemh72 @SianieRoo @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK We are sleep deprived & terrified, women at 5am, stench still in the house 1pm 3rd time in 24 hours, we can't go on like this #stopthestink

According to the figures @EnvAgency Wallys should have been closed down last year? Why are we still suffocating? @JamesBevanEA  @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink https://t.co/w7zGNphLO7

@JuliaBradbury @davemh72 @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK It‚Äôs starting to feel like a cover up Julia, high levels of methane as well and particulate matter which can be very hazardous to health.They think we will pipe down but we won‚Äôt. Our children‚Äôs health & futures are at stake #stopthestink
